title: Mental Health (MH) and Substance Use Disorder (SUD) Provider Directory - Site List
description: A. SUMMARY This dataset contains information of Mental Health (MH) and Substance Use Disorder (SUD) programs / sites. It serves as provider directory for the general public to know and search for mental health programs / sites contracted with the City and County of San Francisco. B. HOW THE DATASET IS CREATED The dataset is pulled from our electronic systems. C. UPDATE PROCESS The dataset is updated nightly through sf.gov through Application Programming Interface (API) whenever there are changes. There is monthly review and tracking. D. HOW TO USE THIS DATASET There are filters for some data fields for quick search. For example, if we want to search all mental health programs that serve women, we would use the Gender filter and select “Women” and “All”. E. RELATED DATASETS

columns.name: provider_directory
columns.description: Site Category: MH = Mental Health Sites, SUD = Substance Use Disorder Sites.

columns.name: site_id
columns.description: Unique identifier per program/site.

columns.name: npi
columns.description: National Provider Identifier (NPI) of the program/site. It is a 10-digit number that identifies health care providers as programs/sites.

columns.name: program_name
columns.description: Name of the program/site.

columns.name: legal_entity
columns.description: Legal entity or group name of the program/site.

columns.name: services
columns.description: Description of services of the program/site.

columns.name: language_line
columns.description: Indicator whether the program/site provide language line services.

columns.name: ada_compliant
columns.description: Indicator whether the program’s/site’s facility has accommodations for people with physical disabilities.

columns.name: accepting_new
columns.description: Indicator whether the program/site accepts new clients.

columns.name: accepting_new_comment
columns.description: Comments for accepting new clients.

columns.name: address_line_1
columns.description: First line of the street address of the program/site.

columns.name: address_line_2
columns.description: Second line of the street address of the program/site.

columns.name: city
columns.description: City in the address of the program/site.

columns.name: state
columns.description: State in the address of the program/site.

columns.name: zip
columns.description: Zip code in the address of the program/site.

columns.name: phone_number
columns.description: Phone Number of the program/site.

columns.name: email_address
columns.description: Email Address of the program/site.

columns.name: website
columns.description: Website URL of the program/site.

columns.name: age_group
columns.description: Age group of the program/site.

columns.name: gender_served
columns.description: Gender of clients the program/site served.

columns.name: cultural_competencies
columns.description: Cultural competency of the program/site such as African Americans, Deaf, LGBTQ, Pregnant Women, Residents of Tenderloin, Veterans, Victims of Community Violence, ...

columns.name: languages
columns.description: Languages, other than English, the program/site offered.

columns.name: level_of_care
columns.description: For SUD program/site only. Level of care of the SUD program/site such as 1, 2.1, 3.1, 3.2, 3.3 and 3.5.

columns.name: specialty
columns.description: Specialty services of the program/site such as 24/7 Phone Line, PTSD Treatment, Foster Care, Family Therapy, Group Therapy, Individual Therapy, Prevention, …

columns.name: treatment_type
columns.description: For SUD program/site only. Treatment type of the SUD program/site such as Opioid Treatment Programs & Medications for Opioid Use Disorder (MOUD), Intensive Outpatient Services, Outpatient Services, Residential Treatment  Services, Residential Step-Down and Withdrawal Management  Services.

columns.name: hours_of_operation
columns.description: Hours of operation of the program/site. It may include weekdays, weekends and legal holidays.

columns.name: type_of_care
columns.description: For MH program/site only. Type of care of the MH program/site such as Inpatient, Mobile, Outpatient and Telehealth.

columns.name: type_of_service
columns.description: For MH program/site only. Type of service of the MH program/site such as Adult Residential Treatment Services, Crisis Intervention, Intensive Care Coordination, Medication Support Services, Mental Health Services, Targeted Case Management, …

columns.name: data_as_of
columns.description: Timestamp when the data was last updated in the source system.

columns.name: data_updated_at
columns.description: Timestamp when the data was last compiled by scripts.

columns.name: data_loaded_at
columns.description: Timestamp the data was uploaded to the open data portal.
